website_summaries.verdict: This steamer is lightweight, easy to clean, and works with a wide array of pots but does not come with one itself.
pros: Universal steamer with lid that can fit on pots that are two to four quarts
Works with both straight-sided and tulip-shaped pots
cons: You'll need to provide your own pot
Some felt that this steamer was smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Steamer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! It fits perfectly on both my soup pots. One is 2 quart size. The other pot is 3 quart size. It will probably fit on other pans also. It is very good quality stainless and is plenty large enough for my needs. I can fit several vegetables in at one time. Both of the pots I will use it on have large handles, but this is not a problem because this steamer sits high enough over the pots to leave room for the handles. This steamer exceeded my expectations! I am so pleased I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Compact, durable, versatile steamer at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric plastic standalone steamer that lasted a long time and worked well but the plastic colander part wore out and cracked so I was in the market for something more durable that’ll last me until I’m old. I think this is it. I’ve steamed quite a few things and they turn out great if I time them well. The steamer fits nicely into at least two of my pots and has a nice glass lid. Cooks more quickly than my countertop model and there’s less appliance clutter in my kitchen now because this stores nicely on a shelf in my cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny ND

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: The basket fits multiple pot sizes which is great, but the actual steamer area is small and difficult to get some items, like tamales, out of easily. The only other bad thing is that the handles and lid handle get hot unlike their pots and pans with the insulated handles.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Deep Steamer Basket
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a steamer that had a deep basket. Most steamers have little baskets that don't hold much and that is not what I wanted. I used this steamer for the first time last night and at this point I am extremely happy with my purchase. It even fits in my old steamer pot which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for those plastic pieces
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to replace the worn out plastic pieces that came with my electric steamer. I personally don't think it's good for my health to be using plastic to steam my food. Just want to warn you people out there to make sure you measure the diameter to make sure it fits. I also bought a stainless steel steaming rack that fits perfectly in the middle. This was a purchase I should have made a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer insert, lid included
customer_reviews.text: Fit is loose for products sold by manufacture, especially on smaller pots with tapered pour sides. Works good but i had to keep burner heat higher because loss of steam. Maybe a small detail, but I'm use to quality design
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eddinger

customer_reviews.title: fits most medium pots
customer_reviews.text: it was very economical, just a touch larger than I desired; my old steamer was about 1 artichoke size; that said this one just did 4 ears of corn and the one I wanted it to replace, couldn't handle that much, had room to spare too. the corn was also very tasty. just need a medium size pan, it does fit several of the ones in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: KPR

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer / Not Sure How to Clean It
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer with glass lid. Steamer works like a charm! Apparently, it is dishwasher safe, but I hand washed instead. Having a little difficulty removing steamed on Brussel Sprout leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Marlboro

customer_reviews.title: Fits the 2.5QT Caphalon pan perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a steamer: well made, doesn't stain or tarnish, holds the steam in well and yet easy to remove. I steamed beets, kale, and small lobster tails with this steamer and it worked wonderfully for all three. It's stainless steel and feels very well made - no loose handles, not easily bent, and didn't stain with the beets.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: Like so many other reviewers, I am grateful to find this great alternative to those frustrating folding inserts. Very happy with the quality and size. Fits perfectly into my 8" pot. Handles get a bit hot, but that's what potholders are for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this little steamer to replace one that I had for many years and it works great! I also love that it has a lid which is a perk consider that my previous did not have one. Be careful of the handles as they will heat up depending on how long you keep the steamer in use. I just use my pot holders if it's too hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: A&MW

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cookwear. I brought this steamer along with the vegetables steaming tray and they work well together. Thanks, to a two- star review, below I purchase this item along with the vegetables steaming tray as suggested. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Steam away
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way to go if you want to steam your veggies. The fold up ones that set in your pan are all junk. Bite the bullet and steam your veggies to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Yochum

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how well made and sturdy this item is.It works perfect. I'm using it for my tamales.
customer_reviews.author: Drlechien

customer_reviews.title: Teamster vegetables good
customer_reviews.text: I like fit small medium and large and you could go from small to medium and big capacity but your vegetables
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Since our little one is eating real food, this universal steamer has been an everyday essential for us! It fits several of our pots. It is light weight and easy to clean. It is a great steamer.
customer_reviews.author: tami r

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Soild good quality stainless steel. Three sizes will fit any pot, and with a tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: pickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: It fits into a couple of different pots we own. It is a little unwieldy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Childers

customer_reviews.title: Fits All-Clad 3 & 4 quart but not All-Clad 2 quart
customer_reviews.text: Better fit for my All-Clad 3 and 4 quart pots than the All-Clad steamer and cost less. Doesn’t fit the 2 quart All-Clad pot. Decent built quality, although a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: 人

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to clean and seems to steam alright
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done. We use it for steaming baby food. Pretty easy to clean and seems to steam alright. Metal seems a little thin, so I am not sure how long it will last. That is my only complaint, as I wish it was a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Really easy product to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy product to use, just boil some water in a pot below and steam anything you like. Does not work well with very small pots, but very well with your average pot. Seller was very easy to work with, product arrived early. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very easy to use, you can use it almost with any pot because of the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Arman

customer_reviews.title: Works well and does double duty.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for steaming and boiling simultaneously. The pot is light weight which hopefully won't affect it's longevity. Happy with the size as it's great to steam veggies and then have water going for pasta. One note, which I never knew: Do not salt water while it's still cold. Wait for it to boil when using stainless pots. Never knew what was causing pitting on my older cookware. Circular includes this warning with the pot. Good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've used it several times and would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is universal so the fit is smaller at the bottom than at the top. It fits my both my 2 and 3 quart pan well. I've used it several times and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had ordered just the steamer needed the pot too ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered just the steamer needed the pot too. Which was my fault not understanding it was steamer and lid only.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: I don't have stainless steel, but this fits perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have stainless steel, but this fits perfectly in my hard anodized Circulon pots, I use it for vegetables or to steam fish over rice, whie the rice is cooking.
customer_reviews.author: fillygrl

customer_reviews.title: Fits my circulon pots very well, and works exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my circulon pots very well, and works exactly as it should. I bought my pots and pans at a big box retailer, and they didn't come with a steamer basket. This worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: If you own Circulon cook wear then you need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect steam basket!!!!! Can't imagine using my wire collapsible steam basket ever again. This fits 4 of my circulon pots. So awesome to have that versatility. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: greater steamer
customer_reviews.text: This fits my posts great. Only draw back is the lid handle has no rubber coating so take special care to use a pot holder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The steamer fits and works well on my pot would recommend

customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. Good quality and works with many size pots.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and have not used it as yet because I have been using another steamer I purchased the same time. I like because of its quality and adaptability to so many different pot sizes. P

customer_reviews.title: Steaming well... get a pot that fits...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to steam tamales!... 1 hr on medium heat if they are frozen does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Jayceto

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, as far as I'm concerned. It works great with the medium and large pots that came with our set from Costco. Much more attractive than the flimsy universal steamer baskets.

customer_reviews.title: a great steamer
customer_reviews.text: practical, durable, health-preserving, easy to use and to clean, a convenient size
customer_reviews.author: Very satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Steamer works great in any medium sized pot. Veggies much better than microwaved veggies.

customer_reviews.title: ... give my old Farberware one to my daughter and love my Circulon
customer_reviews.text: I had to give my old Farberware one to my daughter and love my Circulon, especially because it fits so many sized pots.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Himko

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Received one last year and has helped me ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Received one last year and has helped me tremendously in making veggies quickly and easily. Bought for couple family members this year for Christmas. Both have sent me messages and pics when using with big smiles.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on our All Clad

customer_reviews.text: Really good. Lovely to have a steamer which fits multiple sized pots. It arrived promptly and was well packed.

customer_reviews.title: Works with all of my pots.
customer_reviews.text: It fits all my pots (well, except for the huge soup pots). YAY! Just what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, but clean immediately after use to avoid food sticking to it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schlitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a steamer. Works with multiple pots!
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this with the 3 handles - work great on several size of our pots.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very well built. Very happy with it. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Great pot, holes are just the right size, nests in the other pots great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Markowitz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever used one of those steamers that fold up, you know how difficult it is to clean them. THIS universal steamer with a lid works with a number of different pan sizes and cleans up like a dream. If you like to steam your vegetables, this steamer insert with its own lid is for you. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happy gardener

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Performs "not so nice"
customer_reviews.text: My big issue with this is that I have a pot perfectly-sized for this, but if you have too much vegetables in the pot (meaning the smaller-size grocery store frozen pack for basically a family meal's worth of veggies), the steam starts rolling out the crack between the basket and your pot. Takes much longer to steam vegetables than my other baskets. Sure looks nice - just wish it was more functional.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: a new go to in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I really love this steamer. I used it last night and my veggies were just awesome. You just simply set this on top of a sauce pan that has water in it and a few minutes later perfect steamed veggies. This is a go to in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this ...bought for my son and he just loves it
customer_reviews.author: NancyL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new streamer. My other finally died. I love this steamer and it fits on my different sauce pans.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Friscia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Aaaaa great for steaming veggies works well great price aaaa
customer_reviews.author: paul sing

customer_reviews.title: but it works good.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger around, but it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Minn

customer_reviews.title: Seems like give me an used one
customer_reviews.text: A little bit small. No bottom! Seems like give me an used one.
customer_reviews.author: qiyue

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize this gets placed into another pot! Too much to wash just to steam veggies!!! :(
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: wish
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have had a way to get the pot to go with the steamer when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well in most of my 6 inch, 7 inch and 8 inch pots. Doesn't fit in my All Clad 2 quart pot. So, just be aware, this insert may fit most, there will be some exceptions. The glass lid fits very well and has a little heft to it, holds in the steam very well. Performs as you would expect. It has a large capacity too. Cleanup in the dishwasher is a snap. Manual cleaning isn't difficult. In the pic that I posted with my review, the basket is sitting in my Cuisinart 1.5 quart saucepan. I'm happy with this and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Kayye

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This steamer worked great with my wife's Rachael Ray cookset. the steamer warms up very fast and sufficient the food she cooks gets done in minutes. Space is amazing for such a small steamer. Lee recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: alfonso d aviles

customer_reviews.title: By far the best steamer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many stand alone streamers over the years, many of which worked well. But the clean up was already really punishing. So many parts to clean and dry. When I bought my new set of Circulon hard anodized cookware, I decided to purchase this as an additional add-on. I have not been disappointed. It fits perfectly into all of my pots, and is very well made and sturdy. With only two parts to wash, clean up is easy, and I'm finding my self steaming a whole lot more!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived at I was extremely surprised of the quality given the price paid. The piece is extremely heavy duty and really has some weight to it. I can tell this piece will last me YEARS ,so I'm very happy I purchased this over one of those collapsable/ insert type steamers.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Overall fairly nice graduated steamer.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer is of good quality and well built. It does have a stepped/contoured bottom to fit many different pot sizes. I have 2.5 quart and a 1.5 quart Contemporary Calphalon pots that it fits fairly well but not perfect. It fits well enough to do the job it was intended for, but for the price, I guess it could have included the bottom half like the Cuisinart (Same Price of $26.00) that I saw at Home Goods. Overall I would say it is a reasonable item to get if you want to steam vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - No Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who does not like cooking with plastic or having her food in any sort of heated plastic. It was the best thing that I could find for steaming vegetables Without using plastic. It's not a "kitchen gadget" like a normal steamer, so it doesn't require room on the counter. You just put it with your pots and pans, and get it out when you need it. Also, the funneling-down design allows it to be used with different pot sizes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than a plastic microwave steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to reach up high over the stove to use the microwave to steam vegetables. It's was quick, but has drawbacks. I couldn't easily steam dumplings, pot stickers, egg rolls. Chinese Bao buns, or other home made items like that. The best feature of this steamer is that I can easily lift the lid to test potatoes, for example, to see if they are done. Starting and stopping the microwave was tedious. This fits perfectly on the Calphalon Unison Nonstick 4 quart soup pot that I bought to go with it. Heavy and well made. Quality shows with this brand. It will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: this pot is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This steamer has solved so many issues - it fits on a medium pan - could go larger but I like this one - so I don't take up one of my big burners! It is sturdy and so easy to use - I am very satisfied with this purchase - oh and very easy to lift up whatever you are steaming to see if there is adequate water level =
customer_reviews.author: liketoread

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2-3 lbs. of vegetables!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for 2-3 lbs. of vegetables which is what we needed. We are a family of 10 and our small steamer that came with our kitchen pots and pans set was just not large enough. This insert fits my pot perfect and fits double what my original steamer insert could hold. Also pleasantly surprised by the weight of the stainless steel. Nice heavy duty stainless steel that should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong & Durable, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We always used a plastic electric rice cooker/steamer and it was a nasty mess to clean...when it came to the reservoir I was never sure about the general cleanliness of using it. In this case, it will be tidy after a fast high temp run in the dishwasher, and it is sturdy and washes up beautifully. I figured I'd have to use it in my stockpot, but a small circumference pot was just right and less water to heat. The steamed veggies turned out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RickDeckard

customer_reviews.title: Well made and handy to have in any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: If you want to eat better having a steamer is an easy way to get more portions of veggies on your plate. I needed a new one and the lid is great, not cheap but it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: D. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Does the job andhopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.text: After one use it looks very used up. But I love the concept and it fits nicely in my chantel small pot.
customer_reviews.author: martinatunafish

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new steaming pot! It fits our cookware great and easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mauiwowie

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very well made; sturdy, pretty, fits in a lot of pan sizes. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lynne housenga

customer_reviews.title: Works with Cuisinart too!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent steamer. Can steam an entire head of brocoli. Also fits into out cuisinart multi-clad and French cookware. Well,made.,fast shipping. Recommened!
customer_reviews.author: James J. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This item is great because it is not as big as a steamer, just right. Also, you can put it into any pot. I recommend buying. It is a little pricey but good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truck driver approved
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I’m a truck driver and wanted to get rid of my microwave that I only used to steam vegetables. The circulon takes up way less room and only takes a few more minutes to steam than a microwave. I use with a small electric stove eye and of course have an inverter in my truck. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel crowder

customer_reviews.title: Versatile steamer
customer_reviews.text: Steaming vegtables to preserve nutrition. Clear lid important and this insert fits multiple pot sizes. Son delighted with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: TBEvergreen

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: How I ever lived without this, I will never know. I love the glass lid as it prevents me from overcooking my green veggies. I love that it is all stainless steel as I don't want any non-stick toxins in my food. I love that the handles don't protrude too far over the cooktop. It is nice and deep and can hold a lot of veggies. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: generic

customer_reviews.title: versatile, fit several size pots.
customer_reviews.text: Used the pot to steam vegetables. I liked that no matter how little or hoe large the veggies were all perfectly steamed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quality. I used this to steam asparagus and they came out just right. Fit right into the pots I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our Caphalon pots and pans. All stainless, looks nice, and is very good quality for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Fits 3 different pans, also can be used as a double boiler by putting a heat proof bowl inside.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondacker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer and have used it everyday since I received it. It is well made and fits on several of my pans, none of which are Cirulon. The base doesn't appear to be large, but it is well designed and easily accommodates a large bunch of greens. The lid is nice and heavy and seals very well.

customer_reviews.text: Very small - thought it would have been larger. Ended up giving it to our son who is single.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty steamer! Fits in several of my Circulon pans. Beautiful stainless steel that didn't discolor after using. I found the first one to be so great, I actually ordered a second one so I can steam two different vegetables at the same time. I love this and would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: This steamer works great! It fits all my pots and cleans up easily

customer_reviews.text: Have had the foldable steamers in the past. They don't work very well. This steamer is perfect for both fresh and frozen veggies. It fits both the Circulon 3 qt pan as well as the Revere Ware (the old stuff - 1970s). Glad I settled on this product.

customer_reviews.title: VERY USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: I really like this universal steamer because it can fit into more than one size pot. I had been searching for a new one and this one is perfect and at a reasonable price.

customer_reviews.title: love the glass lid
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly on my Cuisinart 3qt pot, and gives me a bonus glass lid for the pot alone when i'm not using the steamer! couldn't be more pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good thing to have on hand for steaming. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice for us! We love that it can be used with different sized pots. It cleans easily and works very well to steam any fresh vegetables for your meal. This has become one of the most used pots in our kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Fits all pans
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fits inside all of my saucepans.
customer_reviews.author: Jana K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer! I needed something to steam vegetables for my baby and this is great because it fits in all my pans, and has a good seal for steaming. It also is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Lake Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good universal fit for several of my Kenmore SS cooking pots that I got at Sam's Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

product_meta.title: Circulon Accessories Stainless Steel Pasta/Steamer Insert with Lid, 20 CM, Silver
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Style Name:Stainless SteelSteaming is one of the smartest and fastest ways to prepare dishes that are delicious, light, and healthy with the convenient Circulon Stainless Steel Universal Steamer with Lid. Designed for use with 2-quart, 3-quart, and 4-quart saucepots and stockpots, this universal steamer works with both tapered and straight-sided pots. The shatter-resistant glass lid fits the steamer tightly so that steamer foods cook quickly and the process can be monitored without heat or flavor loss. The polished stainless steel steamer basket and glass lid are beautifully designed, and because the steamer set is dishwasher safe, it’s also easy to clean. Dual-riveted handles provide a reliable grip for lifting and draining, and the steamer set is oven safe to 500°F. Bring healthy, delicious steaming to the kitchen with style with The Circulon Stainless Steel Universal Steamer with Lid.
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: Universal Stainless Steel Steamer Basket and Glass Lid
VERSATILE STEAMER: The universal steamer fits 2-, 3-, and 4-quart capacity pots, and works with both straight-sided and tulip-shaped Circulon cookware
DURABLE AND DISHWASHER SAFE: Stainless steel vegetable steamer construction is durable, easy to clean, and dishwasher safe
COMING IN HOT: Versatile seafood and veggie steamer pot is oven safe to 500 degrees F
EASY HANDLING: Steamer pot has dual-riveted handles and a shatter-resistant glass lid to seal in heat and flavor and watch foods as they cook
